const response0 = await client.index({
  index: 'twitter',
  id: '1',
  refresh: true,
  body: {
    user: 'kimchy'
  }
})
console.log(response0)

const response1 = await client.count({
  index: 'twitter',
  q: 'user:kimchy'
})
console.log(response1)

const response2 = await client.count({
  index: 'twitter',
  body: {
    query: {
      term: {
        user: 'kimchy'
      }
    }
  }
})
console.log(response2)
